INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the plasma concentrations of olaparib by the amiodarone
INTERACTION.COMMENT: If administering these medications together cannot be avoided, limit the dose of olaparib to 200 mg twice a day with the amiodarone

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the plasma concentrations of olaparib by the diltiazam
INTERACTION.COMMENT: If administering these medications together cannot be avoided, limit the dose of olaparib to 200 mg twice a day.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the plasma concentrations of olaparib by the fluconazole
INTERACTION.COMMENT: If administering these medications together cannot be avoided, limit the dose of olaparib to 200 mg twice a day.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease, possibly very large depending on the inducer, of the plasma concentrations of the olaparib due to increase of its hepatique metabolism by the inducer
Increase of the plasma concentrations of olaparib by the inhibitor
INTERACTION.COMMENT: If administering these medications together cannot be avoided, limit the dose of olaparib to 150 mg twice a day.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the plasma concentrations of olaparib by the verapamil.
INTERACTION.COMMENT: If administering these medications together cannot be avoided, limit the dose of olaparid to 200 mg twice a day.
